title: Poster, "Montréal 1976 - Olympic Games", 1972–76
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black lower left corner: Design: Ernst Roch/Rolf Harder
inscribed: Imprinted in red upper left corner the registred logo of the Olympic Games. at lower left corner: copyright 1972, COJO 76. Litho Canada
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Dan Friedman
description: The Olympic five rings symbol is at center on a white background. The blue, yellow, black green and red interlocking rings are are presented in gradiated bands. Montréal 1976  in black at upper center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Montréal 1976 - Olympic Games", 1972–76.
1972–76. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-160.
